We collect or receive Data in three ways:

(1) you directly provide Data to us, such as by creating an account or signing up for email alerts.

(2) we collect Data on an ongoing basis, such as through cookies and related technologies.

(3) we receive Data from third party with your consent, such as social media platforms.

Data of Account:

b. The password of Moonton account

f. Profile pictures

Use :

b. Activate or authenticate your games and save game progress and stats;

c. Recover your account, locate your account when you receive rewards;

d. To help identify your account to enable us to troubleshoot problems with your account or games and enable you to enjoy certain game features.

a. The purchase information, including purchase time, product, currency, cost.

b. The screenshot photo (if you choose to upload the photo)

c. User ID, Nickname, Server ID

d. Device ID

a. Help identify and troubleshoot problems with your account or games;

b. To survey your opinions through surveys or questionnaires;

c. Communicate with you and respond to your specific requests or questions;

d. Enable you to ask for help from customer service if there is a problem streaming your game；

e. Manage and send you confirmations and important Data about your account, purchases, subscriptions, and warranties.

Legal Basis:

Necessary for our performance of a contract with you.

Necessary for our legitimate interests in providing you with support in relation to the game, responding to your communications, and updating you in relation to your account.

 

The other data you provide to us:

Use :

a. When you participate in online discussions or otherwise interact with us;

b. When you voluntarily complete a customer survey or provide feedback / requests on any of our message boards or via email;

c. When you choose to share the live video content (voice, face) in game, we will collect the same (note that it is optional for you to share this data).

d. If you are located specific area (e.g., the Middle East), and turn on the video recording function (if any) in the game and agree us to record your in-game behavior, we will collect and process video content (is different from the live video content) which show your in-game behavior to identify the main problems encountered by you in the novice stage and optimize your experience.

We collect such data with your consent.

Necessary for our legitimate interests in responding to your interactions with us and ensuring that we deal appropriately with any requests that you have.

 

Any of the above data (to the extent required and permitted under applicable laws) :
